name: APlaceDominatedByHoles
description:
Elementary school student Jamon seems to be in trouble, she has a strange black hole growing out of her hand, why is this ......

is a turn-based storyline-oriented single-player game, when encountering a sudden appearance of the enemy, choose to attack defense and other actions to deal with it, when the enemy is defeated, you can absorb the enemy's ability for your own use, please pay attention to their own ability to match, to help the protagonist to solve the problem in front of them.

When the protagonist falls into the dream world, the dream goblins he meets can provide powerful props, so buy them and improve yourself.

Help the main character plan his daily travel destinations, which may trigger unexpected events, a chance encounter with the neighbor's big brother, or a strangely dressed exorcist uncle.
